scripts.cs-i: rm -rf temp/nette-coding-standard && composer create-project nette/coding-standard temp/nette-coding-standard && cp ./coding-standard/project.xml ./temp/nette-coding-standard/preset-sniffer/project.xml && cp ./coding-standard/project.php ./temp/nette-coding-standard/preset-fixer/project.php
scripts.cs: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php -d memory_limit=512M temp/nette-coding-standard/ecs check src tests --preset project
scripts.cs-f: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php -d memory_limit=512M temp/nette-coding-standard/ecs check src tests --preset project --fix
